content: In Norse mythology, Yggdrasil connects the nine realms.
E=mc²: Energy equals mass times the speed of light squared.
Art evokes the mystery without which the world would not exist.
The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts. — Marcus Aurelius
Mythology is not a lie, it is the penultimate truth.
The observable universe is 93 billion light-years in diameter.
Magic is just science we do not yet understand.
